languages.text: Все под контролем. Бунтарей усмирили, призрак Теодоры нас больше не побеспокоит. От Идиры тоже больше не будет проблем — распорядитесь, чтобы от тела избавились.

traits.locale_text: Все под контролем. Бунтарей усмирили, призрак Теодоры нас больше не побеспокоит. От Идиры тоже больше не будет проблем — распорядитесь, чтобы от тела избавились.

languages.text: "Everything is under control. The rebels have been pacified, and the ghost of Theodora won't trouble us again. Idira won't cause us any more problems either — see to the disposal of the bodies."
languages.original_text: Все под контролем. Бунтарей усмирили, призрак Теодоры нас больше не побеспокоит. От Идиры тоже больше не будет проблем — распорядитесь, чтобы от тела избавились.

traits.locale_text: "Everything is under control. The rebels have been pacified, and the ghost of Theodora won't trouble us again. Idira won't cause us any more problems either — see to the disposal of the bodies."
"Everything is under control. The rebels have been pacified, and the ghost of Theodora won't trouble us again. Idira won't cause us any more problems either — see to the disposal of the bodies."
"Everything is under control. The rebels have been pacified, and the ghost of Theodora won't trouble us again. Idira won't cause us any more problems either — see to the disposal of the bodies."
"Everything is under control. The rebels have been pacified, and the ghost of Theodora won't trouble us again. Idira won't cause us any more problems either — see to the disposal of the bodies."

languages.text: “一切都已经在控制之中。叛乱分子已经消灭掉了，西奥多拉的幽灵也不会再惹任何麻烦了。而且，伊迪拉也不会再给我们带来任何问题了，叫人来处理一下尸体吧。”
languages.original_text: "Everything is under control. The rebels have been pacified, and the ghost of Theodora won't trouble us again. Idira won't cause us any more problems either — see to the disposal of the bodies."

traits.locale_text: “一切都已经在控制之中。叛乱分子已经消灭掉了，西奥多拉的幽灵也不会再惹任何麻烦了。而且，伊迪拉也不会再给我们带来任何问题了，叫人来处理一下尸体吧。”

languages.text: «Todo está bajo control. Los rebeldes están apaciguados y el fantasma de Theodora no volverá a molestarnos. Idira tampoco dará más problemas; encárguese de los cuerpos».
languages.original_text: "Everything is under control. The rebels have been pacified, and the ghost of Theodora won't trouble us again. Idira won't cause us any more problems either — see to the disposal of the bodies."

traits.locale_text: «Todo está bajo control. Los rebeldes están apaciguados y el fantasma de Theodora no volverá a molestarnos. Idira tampoco dará más problemas; encárguese de los cuerpos».

languages.text: 「すべて把握している。反乱者は鎮圧済みで、シオドーラの亡霊はもう{mf|俺|私}たちを苦しめることはないだろう。イディラもこれ以上問題を起こすことはない…死体の処理を頼む」
languages.original_text: "Everything is under control. The rebels have been pacified, and the ghost of Theodora won't trouble us again. Idira won't cause us any more problems either — see to the disposal of the bodies."

traits.locale_text: 「すべて把握している。反乱者は鎮圧済みで、シオドーラの亡霊はもう{mf|俺|私}たちを苦しめることはないだろう。イディラもこれ以上問題を起こすことはない…死体の処理を頼む」

languages.text: "Es ist alles unter Kontrolle. Die Rebellen wurden befriedet und Theodoras Geist wird uns nicht mehr behelligen. Auch Idira wird uns keinen Ärger mehr machen ... seht zu, dass die Leichen entsorgt werden."
languages.original_text: "Everything is under control. The rebels have been pacified, and the ghost of Theodora won't trouble us again. Idira won't cause us any more problems either — see to the disposal of the bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist alles unter Kontrolle. Die Rebellen wurden befriedet und Theodoras Geist wird uns nicht mehr behelligen. Auch Idira wird uns keinen Ärger mehr machen ... seht zu, dass die Leichen entsorgt werden."

languages.text: « La situation est sous contrôle. Les rebelles ont été pacifiés, et le fantôme de Théodora ne reviendra plus nous importuner. Quant à Idira, elle ne nous causera plus de problèmes, elle non plus. Veillez à l'évacuation des corps. »
languages.original_text: "Everything is under control. The rebels have been pacified, and the ghost of Theodora won't trouble us again. Idira won't cause us any more problems either — see to the disposal of the bodies."

traits.locale_text: « La situation est sous contrôle. Les rebelles ont été pacifiés, et le fantôme de Théodora ne reviendra plus nous importuner. Quant à Idira, elle ne nous causera plus de problèmes, elle non plus. Veillez à l'évacuation des corps. »

languages.text: "Her şey kontrol altında. İsyancılar etkisiz hâle getirildi, Theodora'nın hayaleti bir daha başımıza bela olmayacak. İdira da başka sorun çıkarmayacak. Cesetlerden kurtulun."
languages.original_text: "Everything is under control. The rebels have been pacified, and the ghost of Theodora won't trouble us again. Idira won't cause us any more problems either — see to the disposal of the bodies."

traits.locale_text: "Her şey kontrol altında. İsyancılar bastırıldı ve Theodora'nın hayaleti bir daha başımıza bela olmayacak. İdira da başka sorun çıkarmayacak. Cesetlerden kurtulun."
